name: Deaf Services
description: Toolworks offers individuals who are deaf and hard-of-hearing the following services: - Job training and placement - Volunteer placement - College Preparation - Independent living skills training and support
fullDescription: Toolworks offers individuals who are deaf and hard-of-hearing the following services: - Job training and placement - Volunteer placement - College Preparation - Independent living skills training and support
whatTheyOffer: Toolworks offers individuals who are deaf and hard-of-hearing the following services: - Job training and placement - Volunteer placement - College Preparation - Independent living skills training and support
howToGetIt: For more information, email info@toolworks.org or videophone at 415.255.5857.
